1.text: Trace a circle onto the watermelon rind using your vodka bottle’s cap.

2.text: Cut out the circle to create a hole in the watermelon.

3.text: Poke holes into the pink watermelon flesh using a skewer.

4.text: Pour vodka into the watermelon through a funnel.

5.text: Wait until the vodka seeps into the watermelon before refilling the funnel.

6.text: Refrigerate your vodka watermelon overnight before the party.

7.text: Serve the vodka watermelon drink immediately after removing it from the fridge.

8.text: Slice off the bottom and top off of the watermelon.

9.text: Scoop out the pink watermelon flesh using a melon baller.

10.text: Soak the watermelon balls in vodka for a few hours to prepare a fruit-filled cocktail.

11.text: Marinate the watermelon balls in vodka briefly to serve them as a snack.

12.text: Blend and strain the watermelon flesh if you prefer a boozy fruit juice.

13.text: Serve the boozy fruit in the hollowed-out watermelon bowl.
